analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco akatakalyāṇo hoti, akatakusalo, akatabhīruttāṇo, katapāpo, kataluddo, katakibbiso.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave ekaccaḥ akata kalyāṇaḥ hoti akata kusalaḥ akata bhīruttāṇaḥ kata pāpaḥ kata luddaḥ kata kibbisaḥ

original: So ‘akataṁ me kalyāṇan’tipi tappati, ‘kataṁ me pāpan’tipi tappati.
analyzed: saḥ a katam me kalyāṇan tipi tappati katam me pāpan tipi tappati

original: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhammā tapanīyā”ti.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave dve dhammā tapanīyā ati

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
